Who I am...

Hi!, Welcome to my portfolio üëèüëèüëè. I'm a full stack web developer based in the beautiful city of Miami, FL.

I love CSS and JavaScript, which along with other tools and technologies I create clean and beautiful user interfaces and websites. I'm very passionate about what I do, so I guess that's the secret to my success and commitment.

I started my journey as a web developer in 2016 when I had the opportunity to move to the United States. Coming from a third world country where there was minimum professional opportunities has given me the drive and passion to develop a career I have always dreamt of.
